refnamediv.refpurpose: It gives Impulse response of digital filter

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: x_r = impz(b) x_r = impz(b, a) x_r = impz(b, a, n) x_r = impz(b, a, n, fs) [x_r, t_r] = impz(b, a, n, fs)

listitem.para: impz chooses the number of samples and returns the response in the column vector, x_r.
impz returns the sample times in the column vector, t_r
samples of the impulse response t(by default ,n = length(t) and is computed automatically.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: [x_r,t_r] = impz(b,a) returns the impulse response of the filter with numerator coefficients, b, and denominator coefficients, a. impz chooses the number of samples and returns the response in the column vector, x_r, and the sample times in the column vector, t_r. t_r = [0:n-1]' and n = length(t) is computed automatically.
